body: In the anime version, both Liliana and Anette are fucking the same guy: Anette’s lover. Tatsuya’s not even mentioned.
Just to whoever is asking they are having sex with their respective lovers, just that aoi nagisa put them in the same page to sell more I guess.
So... are they fucking their lovers or a same guy ? Either way, there is an anime of it coming.

@TheLastTatlFan In earlier volumes, there was at least one more difference between the two women: Liliana (straight hair) had a more distinguished face with a noticeably pointier-drawn chin, making her look kinda like a princess. Annette (curled hair)’s face, on the other hand, had a softer look to it.
This chapter might not have been a great idea. It draws too much attention to the fact that these two are totally identical, save for the degree to which their hair is straight.
Even more chocolate with vanilla filling... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
